query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pdiCompetencyGaps` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `planId` int NOT NULL,
  `competencyId` int NOT NULL,
  `currentLevel` int NOT NULL,
  `targetLevel` int NOT NULL,
  `gap` int NOT NULL,
  `priority` enum('alta','media','baixa') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'media',
  `employeeActions` text,
  `managerActions` text,
  `sponsorActions` text,
  `status` enum('identificado','em_desenvolvimento','superado') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'identificado',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `pdiCompetencyGaps_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `pdiCompetencyGaps_planId_pdiPlans_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`planId`) REFERENCES `pdiPlans`(`id`) ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pdiRisks` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `planId` int NOT NULL,
  `category` enum('tecnico','comportamental','organizacional','externo') NOT NULL,
  `description` text NOT NULL,
  `probability` enum('baixa','media','alta') NOT NULL,
  `impact` enum('baixo','medio','alto') NOT NULL,
  `mitigation` text,
  `status` enum('identificado','mitigado','ocorrido') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'identificado',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `pdiRisks_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `pdiRisks_planId_pdiPlans_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`planId`) REFERENCES `pdiPlans`(`id`) ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pdiReviews` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `planId` int NOT NULL,
  `reviewerId` int NOT NULL,
  `reviewDate` date NOT NULL,
  `progressAssessment` text NOT NULL,
  `achievedMilestones` text,
  `pendingActions` text,
  `recommendations` text,
  `nextReviewDate` date,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `pdiReviews_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `pdiReviews_planId_pdiPlans_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`planId`) REFERENCES `pdiPlans`(`id`) ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pdiReviews` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `planId` int NOT NULL,

  `reviewDate` date NOT NULL,
  `progressAssessment` text NOT NULL,
  `achievedMilestones` text,
  `pendingActions` text,
  `recommendations` text,

);
